entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1 except 7 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 80 near the Trans-Canada Highway this afternoon. High plus 1 except 7 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:34 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023
